name: Brad's Trendies
intro: Brad's Trendies is a neighborhood footwear house built on craft, comfort, and consistency. Every pair is curated with daily movement in mind, balancing practical durability with a clean classic profile.
storyIntro: Get closer to the people and process behind Brad's Trendies. From material selection to final finishing, each release is shaped by hands-on care and a deep respect for everyday wear.
